reviews.customers_say: Customers like the dress's style. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it perfect while others say it runs a bit large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering. Runs a bit big.
items.body: This dress is pretty cute and I think it would flatter most figures. Iâ€™m returning it because itâ€™s a bit too large on me. I havenâ€™t decided if Iâ€™ll order a smaller size yet because I actually bought another dress thatâ€™s very similar. I just need to compare the two and make a decision! I would recommend this dress and suggest sizing down. Read more
items.author: Pamela A.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, wrong fit
items.body: I wanted to love this dress. It was loose on the top. The bottom was snug. It would have to be ironed. The color was nice, love the style, but I had to return, it just didn't fit me the way I would have liked. 5'4", small. Read more
items.author: Moon Child

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!
items.body: This dress is fabulous! It was flattering and comfortable. The material was soft with quite a bit of stretch. I am a more mature woman so I appreciated that it hit just above the knee and wasnâ€™t too short. I only wish it was available in more colors, a red version would be amazing! Read more
items.author: Sassy Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit!
items.body: Loved this dress! The fit was perfect, the fabric is also very stretchy so it felt nice and not skin tight. Read more
items.author: Rachel Hughes-Prehn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Stretchy Fabric, Runs Slightly Large.
items.body: I took a chance on this dress... I thought the extra layer that wraps and ties right below your waist might make me look bottom-heavy or add unwanted bulk to my lower abdomen and hips, and the knot would ruin the side silhouette. But it's not bad-looking if you tie it in a square knot so it lies relatively flat. The gathered fabric at the hips still creates some bulky ripples and wrinkles, and the odd waist seam almost creates the illusion of having a little side roll. I'm not quite sure why it was designed this way; it would have looked better if it were fitted at the waist, but flat and smooth. I love the stretchiness of the fabric, which is why I decided to go for it. The 90% viscose, 10% elastane drapes and hugs the body beautifully without feeling tight, and is so comfortable to move in. I'm a gym rat, so I like anything that feels as comfortable as my gym clothes. The fabric is the best part of the dress! I wish it came in an XS, as it's just kind of loose on me in general, even though I almost always wear a small. The top part and the sleeves look a little sloppy, like it can't decide if it wants to be loose or fitted, but thankfully, the bottom is more fitted, so it saves the look. Maybe it's just the style. For reference, I'm 5'1", 115 lbs., 35" chest, 26" waist, 34.5" hips, athletic build. I'm in my mid-late 50s, or "pushin' 60" as my husband likes to remind me. ðŸ˜‚ After over 32 years together, we can laugh about it! This is a very stylish yet not revealing dress, which I like, as I'm not into attracting attention. It's a beautiful dress for a casual date night with the hubby. Read more
items.author: Chinatown Fight Club NYC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Flattering!
items.body: I personally love this dress! The material is soft and itâ€™s comfortable to wear. With the tie in the front it is also very flattering on a more curvy body. I am a size 14. An XL in Cider is for a size 12, but this dress is stretchy and fits me well. Read more
items.author: Ashley Lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Was very cute. Quality is good and itâ€™s very stylish. Also very comfortable and fits nicely. Read more
items.author: Avalon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little black dress
items.body: Great date night dress! The off-the-shoulder cut, wrap style and length are perfect for a sexy-but-not-too-revealing look. Fabric stretch flatters your curves without showing every flaw. Only two drawbacks with this dress, which I find consistently with Cider pieces--the arms are far too long and there's no built-in security strap for hanging the dress, which is a must for an off-the-shoulder dress. Otherwise, it slips right off the hanger Read more
items.author: SaltNWhimsy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress One Shoulder Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
